text: What's the best Django search app?
I'm building a Django project that needs search functionality, and until there's a django.contrib.search, I have to choose a search app.

lis.text: has a Django- or at least Python-friendly API

text: Here are some apps I've heard of, please suggest others if you know of any:
I'd also like to avoid using a third-party search engine (like Google SiteSearch), because some of the data I'd like to index is for site members only and should not be public.
